item.title: A Year in Review: Most Read Articles in 2017
item.description:
It seems to be usual nowadays to review the previous year, and readers apparently like Top-N Lists â€” that’s you now, so let’s hope that my understanding works with you too.

Of course 2018 will see its own amount of new and original content added to this blog, with a continuous focus towards how to make the best out of the SQL powerful programming language, and its advanced concurrency semantics.
